mapper.select: SELECT a.USER_REL_ID AS userRelId, a.CUST_ID AS custId, a.LAW_ORG_ID AS lawOrgId, a.ECIF_CUST_ID AS ecifCustId, a.CUST_NAME AS custName, a.BELONG_MGR_ID AS belongMgrId, a.BELONG_MGR_NAME AS belongMgrName, a.MAIN_MGR_TYPE AS mainMgrType, a.ASSIGN_TYPE AS assignType, a.BEGIN_DATE AS beginDate, a.END_DATE AS endDate, a.ASSIGN_USER_ID AS assignUserId, a.ASSIGN_DATE AS assignDate FROM T_PCM_USER_REL AS a
